title: The Lord of the Rings WORST Threat is Not Sauron... 🔥👁️🔥 (LotR) #shorts
description:
If you've watched The Lord of the Rings Return of the King, then you're surely familiar with the memeable Denethor scene where he CHOMPS into a tomato. But, what you may not know is his food is likely POISONED! Trust us, in Middle Earth you should watch what you eat... or rather watch what you're eating on.
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee, Ash, and Mike Keenan (The Pokémon Biologist) 
Editor: Tyler Mascola
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman
